name: JavaScript Language Basics

quote.text: JavaScript was not developed at Sun Microsystems, the home of Java. JavaScript was developed at Netscape. It was originally called LiveScript, but that name wasn't confusing enough.

description: JavaScript is the chosen language of the internet browser. Find out how it ticks.
goal: Demonstrate the basic foundations in the JavaScript Language. You should know about variables, strings, loops, arrays, objects, functions, etc.

suggested_assignments.title: Solve at least 10 JavaScript coding problems
Demonstrate how you've done all of #1 in your work or side work

suggested_assignments.topic: Make something else creative that proves you are totally legit in this topic
